website_summaries.verdict: For a modern flair in your outdoor living space, these 2 Modway pillows are a good bet.
cons: These pillows should not go through the washing machine

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!!
customer_reviews.text: These will do what I want. Movable pillows for the rattan sofa. I thought these might be black, but they are a deep indigo. There is a zipper to accept the ‘lightly’ stuffed pillow form. You can remove the inner pillow and probably zip it back up and do a quick cold water wash as needed. The pair I ordered came Fedex in a cardboard box. Each pillow was in a vacuum sealed bag and fluffed immediately upon opening Could the pillows use more fiberfill? Yes, but I’m good.
customer_reviews.author: PhDBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Pillow talk
customer_reviews.text: Love love love them. Beautiful color and the material dries up quick. I leave them out no mildew nothing. Going on 2yrs
customer_reviews.author: Julka Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Hum, I'm not sure of these pillows durability and I'm not satisfied with the comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these two pillows a score a three in score. The reason is, I notice microfiber from these pillows, on the patio couch and and love seat patio love seat. Fibers often attaches to your clothes you are wearing, it is most notices on black clothes and it is very noticeable. The comfort is less comfort them the chain link I purchased. Yhe become flat with limited comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Psalmyst23

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I imagined.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty toss pillow, but the photo in the ad (photo on right) must be a very tiny chair for this pillow to look so large. My photo (photo on left) is how big the pillow really is on porch furniture. Also, kind of thin which is ironic since they go to so much trouble to vacuum seal these for shipping and they aren't that thick to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Rix

customer_reviews.title: More expensive than other sellers, pillows are great tho
customer_reviews.text: Pillows get 5 starts, but the seller only 3. They listed the price of the pillows for $20 more than another seller and they don’t have free returns. When I messaged them they did give me a refund of 10% but still paid much more than I would have with another seller. Oh well. In the end I really like the pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Bill’s wife

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Pillows were better than expected. The blue is indeed a royal blue. Pillows are shipped in vacuum-sealed bags, but puff up nicely after a few minutes of taking them out of the bag. They go nicely with smaller outdoor patio sets.
customer_reviews.author: RcarL

customer_reviews.title: Really attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like these pillows a lot and I like the fact that the graphic is on both sides. Very attractive and a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Deecy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave them out in the rain so I don't know about that. Otherwise I really like these. They look great and I didn't want something too thick.
customer_reviews.author: slee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these in person. Totally fit that Bohemian look I was going for. True Navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bare

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of flat, had to go out and purchase a new pillow insert, other than that great
customer_reviews.author: Aerobebibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged great, fluffed up to full size immediately. Did have a slight odor upon opening package but since using these outside smell not an issue & dissipated within hours. Perfect for slight back support. Using for high back style chairs but beware they are not overstuffed or lofty
customer_reviews.author: Julie Levine

customer_reviews.title: Flat... but cute.
customer_reviews.text: The pillows are pretty deflated... rather thin would need an additional/new insert to appear full for sure. But otherwise, waterproof quality lives up to its promise and the design is still great quality.
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Not as Nice as the Photo
customer_reviews.text: These "pillows" are very flat. They don't have much stuffing at all. They look nice from a distance, but up close they really don't impress.
customer_reviews.author: LauraGee

customer_reviews.title: Very thin. Not enough filler
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are very thin. Not enough filler. Also material is very slippery like a rain coat. Look and feel more like boat pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Susan M Fiely

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: so cute and look great on the bench on my front porch!
customer_reviews.author: Junkie2Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Easy care
customer_reviews.text: This product looks so nice! I think that it will be easy to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Donnielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and I feel like they will hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Love these and get so many compliments. Yes they are water proof!
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: Won’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect for outdoor or even sunroom. Light weight and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley A Cresseveur

customer_reviews.title: Cute but faded
customer_reviews.text: Loved these when I got them! So cute!! But after about 4 weeks in the sun they are terribly faded. Keep them indoors if you want them to last!
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: No way to contact seller ...
customer_reviews.text: Only one pillow was delivered. Clicking product support is a broken link and no phone number is listed.
customer_reviews.author: bdp323

customer_reviews.title: Missing pillow
customer_reviews.text: Where is my other pillow? Description clearly indicates 2 pillows, but there was only one in my order. For what these cost, i would like the second pillow please
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and style!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillows! They’re great quality - perfect for my outdoor screened porch. They seem weather resistant and durable. We’ll see!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the slick material-will be easy to clean and also the covers are removable for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous profile

customer_reviews.title: Quality was more then I expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern and the quality and the fact that you can remove the cover and wash them. Look great on my patio
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Frantsi

customer_reviews.title: On Point!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these pillows. They are perfect! I will definitely buy from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fade resistant, continued water proof
customer_reviews.text: 1 year later, didn’t fade, maintained water resistance, continued fullness. I am ordering 2 more. Also worth noting the material is silky and soft to touch. LOVE these pillows!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

product_meta.title: Modway Outdoor Indoor Two All Weather Patio Throw Pillows in Cartouche
product_meta.description: Color:Cartouche| Size:Two PillowsSkip to a different beat with the Modway Outdoor and Indoor Decor Throw Pillow. Modway Outdoor Throw Pillow compements a variety of decor schemes with a multitude of unique patterns and colors that withstand the elements while delivering a stand-out piece to accent your personality and style. Made of a weather resistant polyester weave, and plush polyester fiber filling, this indoor or outdoor decorative pillow sits comfortably in all your decor venues.
feature_bullets: PATIO REFRESH - Update your backyard or porch with inviting outdoor patio pillows. Effortlessly accommodate the style of your outdoor space with plush pillows that are both comfortable and supportive
INDOOR/OUTDOOR PILLOWS - Indulge in good weather while enjoying reliable comfort. Fade and water resistant, this throw pillow set features all-weather, machine washable fabric covers for easy upkeep
MODERN STYLE - Clean lines and vibrant color make this pillow set a complement to a variety of outdoor decors. This 5" thick pillow features polyester fiber filling for exceptional support
PILLOW MEASUREMENTS - Perfect for the living room, garden, or poolside, this contemporary pillow collection makes the most out of both indoor and outdoor areas. Dimensions: 17.5"W x 17.5"L
NOTE: The pillows come vacuum packed and may take some time to fully fluff up to their full thickness

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
